short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect shadowbans on both Twitter/X accounts and individual tweets instantly with ease.
short.ja: Twitter/Xアカウントとツイートのシャドウバンを簡単かつ即座に検出できます。
short.ko: 트위터/X 계정과 트윗에서 쉐도우밴을 손쉽게 즉시 감지하세요.
short.zh_CN: 轻松快捷地检测Twitter/X账号和推文的shadowban状态。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter Shadowban Test is a browser extension for detecting shadowbans on Twitter / X.

## Features:
Identifies shadowbans and sensitive flags on Twitter accounts
Detects sensitive flags on profile media, such as icons and header images
Flags accounts blocked in specific countries due to legal restrictions
Scans tweets for sensitive flags and age restrictions
Adds buttons to reveal hidden tweets

## Accuracy:
While detecting shadowbans at the account level may sometimes result in false positives or negatives, this tool excels in accurately identifying sensitive flags and age restrictions at the tweet level. For the best results, it's recommended to regularly monitor your account and tweets with Twitter Shadowban Test and consider using it alongside other tools.

## Privacy Policy:
All processing happens locally on your device, with no data transmitted to external servers. The extension does not access Twitter’s internal API or request your credentials, ensuring privacy and security. Be aware that other web pages you visit may be subject to their own terms of service and privacy policies.

Disclaimer: Twitter™ is a registered trademark of Twitter Inc. This extension is neither endorsed by or affiliated with Twitter.
